Target audience
The primary audience for these guidelines is health professionals who are responsible for 
providing postnatal care to women and newborns, primarily in settings where resources 
are limited. These health professionals include physicians, midwives, nurses and auxiliary 
nurse-midwives providing primary health care in facilities and at home
